intro: Anthurium billhahnii, commonly known as the red anthurium, is a tropical plant native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its striking, heart-shaped leaves that are dark green with a velvety texture. The plant produces vibrant red spadices, which are the modified leaves that enclose the true flowers. It thrives in humid, warm environments with indirect light and well-draining soil. Anthurium billhahnii is popular as a decorative houseplant due to its ornamental foliage and long-lasting blooms.
